text: tatha kaha ek eemaan vaale vyakti ne firaun ke gharaane ke, jo chhupa raha tha apana eemaanah kya tum vadh kar doge ek vyakti ko ki vah kah raha haih mera paalanahaar allaah hai? jabaki vah tumhaare paas laaya hai khulee nishaaniyaan tumhaare paalanahaar kee or se? aur yadi vah jhootha ho, to usee ke oopar hai unaka jhooth aur yadi sachcha ho, to aa padega vah kuchh, jisakee tumhen dhamakee de raha hai. vaastav mein, allaah maargadarshan nahin deta use, jo ullanghanakaaree bahut jhootha ho
